name: Planet arcade
description:
Planet arcade!

Entry for the 2022 Newbies game jam!

Everybody loves arcade games! They bring back nostalgia, they are endless, and most importantly a lot of them are MINI GAMES.

And planet arcade is exactly that! You get to play 5 MINIMALISTIC mini games which have a space theme!

They are five mini games for 5 planets! 

Sun - Space shooter

Mercury - whack a mole

Venus - ping pong

Earth - Dino rush

Mars - dodge race

—————————————————————————————

This took a lot of time to code, and it isn’t very polished or juicy but I hope you enjoy it.

Be sure to drop your high scores in the comments below!

Have a nice day! :)
